pvsamv1.Name: spe_module_structure
pvsamv1.Label: Mounting and module structure
pvsamv1.Meta: 0=glass/cell/polymer sheet - open rack,1=glass/cell/glass - open rack,2=polymer/thin film/steel - open rack,3=Insulated back, building-integrated PV,4=close roof mount,5=user-defined

pvsamv1.Name: snl_module_structure
pvsamv1.Label: Module and mounting structure configuration
pvsamv1.Meta: 0=Use Database Values,1=glass/cell/polymer sheet - open rack,2=glass/cell/glass - open rack,3=polymer/thin film/steel - open rack,4=Insulated back building-integrated PV,5=close roof mount,6=user-defined

pvsamv1.Name: snl_aimp
pvsamv1.Label: Max power point current temperature coefficient

pvsamv1.Name: snl_bvmpo
pvsamv1.Label: Max power point voltage temperature coefficient

pvsamv1.Name: snl_mbvmp
pvsamv1.Label: Irradiance dependence of Vmp temperature coefficient

pvsamv1.Name: snl_mbvoc
pvsamv1.Label: Irradiance dependence of Voc temperature coefficient

pvsamv1.Name: mlm_AM_mode
pvsamv1.Label: Air-mass modifier mode
pvsamv1.Meta: 1: Do not consider AM effects, 2: Use Sandia polynomial [corr=f(AM)], 3: Use standard coefficients from DeSoto model [corr=f(AM)], 4: Use First Solar polynomial [corr=f(AM, p_wat)]

pvsamv1.Meta: n x 3 matrix [ start, end, loss ]

pvsamv1.Meta: The number of years in the simulation

pvsamv1.Label: PV loss in DC/DC w/MPPT conversion

pvsamv1.Name: batt_ac_dc_efficiency
pvsamv1.Label: Inverter AC to battery DC efficiency

pvsamv1.Name: batt_meter_position
pvsamv1.Label: Position of battery relative to electric meter

pvsamv1.Name: batt_losses
pvsamv1.Label: Battery system losses at each timestep

pvsamv1.Name: batt_current_choice
pvsamv1.Label: Limit cells by current or power

pvsamv1.Name: batt_Vexp
pvsamv1.Label: Cell voltage at end of exponential zone

pvsamv1.Name: batt_Vnom
pvsamv1.Label: Cell voltage at end of nominal zone

pvsamv1.Name: batt_Qexp
pvsamv1.Label: Cell capacity at end of exponential zone

pvsamv1.Name: batt_Qnom
pvsamv1.Label: Cell capacity at end of nominal zone

pvsamv1.Name: batt_C_rate
pvsamv1.Label: Rate at which voltage vs. capacity curve input

pvsamv1.Name: LeadAcid_qn_computed
pvsamv1.Label: Capacity at discharge rate for n-hour rate

pvsamv1.Name: batt_lifetime_matrix
pvsamv1.Label: Cycles vs capacity at different depths-of-discharge

pvsamv1.Name: batt_calendar_q0
pvsamv1.Label: Calendar life model initial capacity cofficient

pvsamv1.Name: batt_replacement_capacity
pvsamv1.Label: Capacity degradation at which to replace battery

pvsamv1.Name: batt_replacement_schedule
pvsamv1.Label: Battery bank replacements per year (user specified)

pvsamv1.Name: batt_replacement_cost
pvsamv1.Label: Cost to replace battery per kWh

pvsamv1.Name: batt_h_to_ambient
pvsamv1.Label: Heat transfer between battery and environment

pvsamv1.Name: cap_vs_temp
pvsamv1.Label: Effective capacity as function of temperature

pvsamv1.Name: batt_target_power
pvsamv1.Label: Grid target power (AC) for every time step

pvsamv1.Name: batt_target_power_monthly
pvsamv1.Label: Grid target power (AC) on monthly basis

pvsamv1.Name: batt_custom_dispatch
pvsamv1.Label: Custom battery power (DC) for every time step

pvsamv1.Name: batt_dispatch_choice
pvsamv1.Label: Battery dispatch algorithm
pvsamv1.Meta: If behind the meter: 0=PeakShavingLookAhead,1=PeakShavingLookBehind,2=InputGridTarget,3=InputBatteryPower,4=ManualDispatch, if front of meter: 0=AutomatedLookAhead,1=AutomatedLookBehind,2=AutomatedInputForecast,3=InputBatteryPower,4=ManualDispatch

pvsamv1.Name: batt_dispatch_auto_can_gridcharge
pvsamv1.Label: Grid charging allowed for automated dispatch?

pvsamv1.Name: batt_dispatch_auto_can_charge
pvsamv1.Label: PV charging allowed for automated dispatch?

pvsamv1.Name: batt_dispatch_auto_can_clipcharge
pvsamv1.Label: Battery can charge from clipped PV for automated dispatch?

pvsamv1.Name: batt_auto_gridcharge_max_daily
pvsamv1.Label: Allowed grid charging percent per day for automated dispatch

pvsamv1.Name: batt_look_ahead_hours
pvsamv1.Label: Hours to look ahead in automated dispatch

pvsamv1.Name: batt_dispatch_update_frequency_hours
pvsamv1.Label: Frequency to update the look-ahead dispatch

pvsamv1.Name: batt_cycle_cost_choice
pvsamv1.Label: Use SAM model for cycle costs or input custom
